name: Solana Name Service
description: The Solana Name Service (SNS) is a decentralized naming protocol on the Solana blockchain, designed to simplify and enhance user interactions in the Web3 ecosystem. By mapping complex blockchain addresses to human-readable names like “yourname.sol,” SNS aims to make blockchain technology more accessible to a broader audience. SNS has worked to become a cornerstone of Solana infrastructure, supporting digital identity, asset management, and community building.
